description: Returns information about a specific cluster including shipping information, cluster status, and other important metadata.

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The automatically generated ID for a cluster.

nested_items.name: ClusterMetadata
nested_items.description: Information about a specific cluster, including shipping information, cluster status, and other important metadata.

nested_items.name: ClusterId
nested_items.description: The automatically generated ID for a cluster.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The optional description of the cluster.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyARN
nested_items.description: The KmsKeyARN Amazon Resource Name (ARN) associated with this cluster. This ARN was created using the CreateKey API action in Key Management Service (KMS.

nested_items.name: RoleARN
nested_items.description: The role ARN associated with this cluster. This ARN was created using the CreateRole API action in Identity and Access Management (IAM).

nested_items.name: ClusterState
nested_items.description: The current status of the cluster.

nested_items.name: JobType
nested_items.description: The type of job for this cluster. Currently, the only job type supported for clusters is LOCAL_USE.

nested_items.name: SnowballType
nested_items.description: The type of Snowcone device to use for this cluster.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: The creation date for this cluster.

nested_items.name: Resources
nested_items.description: The arrays of  JobResource objects that can include updated  S3Resource objects or  LambdaResource objects.

nested_items.name: S3Resources
nested_items.description: An array of S3Resource objects.

nested_items.name: BucketArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: BeginMarker
nested_items.description: The key that starts an optional key range for an export job. Ranges are inclusive and UTF-8 binary sorted.

nested_items.name: EndMarker
nested_items.description: The key that ends an optional key range for an export job. Ranges are inclusive and UTF-8 binary sorted.

nested_items.name: TargetOnDeviceServices
nested_items.description: Specifies the service or services on the Snow Family device that your transferred data will be exported from or imported into. Amazon Web Services Snow Family supports Amazon S3 and NFS (Network File System).

nested_items.name: ServiceName
nested_items.description: Specifies the name of the service on the Snow Family device that your transferred data will be exported from or imported into.

nested_items.name: TransferOption
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the data is being imported or exported. You can import or export the data, or use it locally on the device.

nested_items.name: LambdaResources
nested_items.description: The Python-language Lambda functions for this job.

nested_items.name: LambdaArn
nested_items.description: An Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that represents an Lambda function to be triggered by PUT object actions on the associated local Amazon S3 resource.

nested_items.name: EventTriggers
nested_items.description: The array of ARNs for  S3Resource objects to trigger the  LambdaResource objects associated with this job.

nested_items.name: EventResourceARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for any local Amazon S3 resource that is an Lambda function's event trigger associated with this job.

nested_items.name: Ec2AmiResources
nested_items.description: The Amazon Machine Images (AMIs) associated with this job.

nested_items.name: AmiId
nested_items.description: The ID of the AMI in Amazon EC2.

nested_items.name: SnowballAmiId
nested_items.description: The ID of the AMI on the Snow device.

nested_items.name: AddressId
nested_items.description: The automatically generated ID for a specific address.

nested_items.name: ShippingOption
nested_items.description: The shipping speed for each node in this cluster. This speed doesn't dictate how soon you'll get each device, rather it represents how quickly each device moves to its destination while in transit. Regional shipping speeds are as follows:
In Australia, you have access to express shipping. Typically, devices shipped express are delivered in about a day.

In the European Union (EU), you have access to express shipping. Typically, Snow devices shipped express are delivered in about a day. In addition, most countries in the EU have access to standard shipping, which typically takes less than a week, one way.
In India, Snow devices are delivered in one to seven days.
In the US, you have access to one-day shipping and two-day shipping.

nested_items.name: Notification
nested_items.description: The Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS) notification settings for this cluster.

nested_items.name: SnsTopicARN
nested_items.description: The new SNS TopicArn that you want to associate with this job. You can create Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) for topics by using the CreateTopic Amazon SNS API action.

nested_items.name: JobStatesToNotify
nested_items.description: The list of job states that will trigger a notification for this job.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: NotifyAll
nested_items.description: Any change in job state will trigger a notification for this job.

nested_items.name: DevicePickupSnsTopicARN
nested_items.description: Used to send SNS notifications for the person picking up the device (identified during job creation).

nested_items.name: ForwardingAddressId
nested_items.description: The ID of the address that you want a cluster shipped to, after it will be shipped to its primary address. This field is not supported in most regions.

nested_items.name: TaxDocuments
nested_items.description: The tax documents required in your Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: GSTIN
nested_items.description: The Goods and Services Tax (GST) documents required in Amazon Web Services Region in India.

nested_items.name: OnDeviceServiceConfiguration
nested_items.description: Represents metadata and configuration settings for services on an Amazon Web Services Snow Family device.

nested_items.name: NFSOnDeviceService
nested_items.description: Represents the NFS (Network File System) service on a Snow Family device.

nested_items.name: StorageLimit
nested_items.description: The maximum NFS storage for one Snow Family device.

nested_items.name: StorageUnit
nested_items.description: The scale unit of the NFS storage on the device.

nested_items.name: TGWOnDeviceService
nested_items.description: Represents the Storage Gateway service Tape Gateway type on a Snow Family device.

nested_items.name: StorageLimit
nested_items.description: The maximum number of virtual tapes to store on one Snow Family device. Due to physical resource limitations, this value must be set to 80 for Snowball Edge.

nested_items.name: StorageUnit
nested_items.description: The scale unit of the virtual tapes on the device.

nested_items.name: EKSOnDeviceService
nested_items.description: The configuration of EKS Anywhere on the Snow Family device.

nested_items.name: KubernetesVersion
nested_items.description: The Kubernetes version for EKS Anywhere on the Snow Family device.

nested_items.name: EKSAnywhereVersion
nested_items.description: The optional version of EKS Anywhere on the Snow Family device.

nested_items.name: S3OnDeviceService
nested_items.description: Configuration for Amazon S3 compatible storage on Snow family devices.

nested_items.name: StorageLimit
nested_items.description: If the specified storage limit value matches storage limit of one of the defined configurations, that configuration will be used. If the specified storage limit value does not match any defined configuration, the request will fail. If more than one configuration has the same storage limit as specified, the other input need to be provided.

nested_items.name: StorageUnit
nested_items.description: Storage unit. Currently the only supported unit is TB.

nested_items.name: ServiceSize
nested_items.description: Applicable when creating a cluster. Specifies how many nodes are needed for Amazon S3 compatible storage on Snow family devices. If specified, the other input can be omitted.

nested_items.name: FaultTolerance
nested_items.description: >Fault tolerance level of the cluster. This indicates the number of nodes that can go down without degrading the performance of the cluster. This additional input helps when the specified StorageLimit matches more than one Amazon S3 compatible storage on Snow family devices service configuration.
